title: Ammaa
author: Ammaa
created_time: October 02, 2022, 03:51:45 PMLast edit: October 07, 2022, 05:57:54 AM by Ammaa
content: A GROUP OF 10.000 HUMANS NFTS ARE GOING FOR OUR FIRST TRIP TO MARS.A TOTAL OF 17.778 COLLECTIBLES NFTS DIVIDED IN 4 DIFFERENTS COLLECTION -FIRST COLLECTION  10.000 UNIQUE  NFTS, -SECOND COLLECTION 5.555 UNIQUE NFTS, -THIRD  COLLECTION  2.222  UNIQUE NFTS, -FOURTH COLLECTION 1  SUPER  RARE  NFTMore details on the website – www.astroxnft.io  The built of the Mars Metaverse, Apps, Games and more Utilities for NFTs Holders.Join our Discord to help us built it1st collection Pre-Sale & Public MintPre-Sale price will be 0.12 ETHPublic Mint price will be 0.32 ETHThis collection will have mint procedures that we will stake and reward holders.--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Staking beginsHolders of Astro X nft will have rewards from staking.--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------2nd collection Pre Sale & Public mint5.555 Astro X nftsOnly Holders of Astro X nfts will have access to Pre-Sale Mint.Pre-Sale price will be 0.05 ETHPublic Mint price will be 0.32 ETH2nd Collection will have 5% Royalties attached to them, Royalties will be distributed as Staking Rewards for the Holders.-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------3rd collection Pre Sale & Public Mint2.222 Astro X nftsOnly Holders of Astro X nfts will have access to Pre-Sale Mint.Pre-Sale price will be 1 ETHPublic Mint will be a Dutch Auction starting at 3.5 ETH3rd Collections will Have 5% Royalties attached to them, they will be distributed as Staking Rewards for Holders.This collection will have Mint procedures----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------4th collection 1 Astro X NFTRaffle + 20 ETH reward for the first holder!The character will have a special feature in the Metaverse.The character will be decided by the Discord Community70% INVESTED INTO STAKING TO REWARD ASTRO X NFT HOLDERS30% TO DEVELOPERS TEAM12 % FOR MARKETING INVESTMENT TO INCREASE FLOOR PRICE ON OPENSEA3% FOR SOCIAL IMPACT85 % DISTRIBUTED FOR ASTRO X NFT HOLDERSWe are committed to keeping Astro X marketing at a high level. We have a team of experts in marketing who work tirelessly to raise awareness of NFT even after the Mint process. We hope that this makes the prices on OpenSea gain value for their owners.We're going to do big online campaigns and big outdoor campaigns, starting with Miami, Los Angeles, and Dubai. Every month, we will carry out new campaigns to achieve the project's objectives.

comments.author: binanceautotrader
comments.body: Nice Arts!! Hope this Project gets some Hype.... The idea is really good!!

comments.author: r_victory
comments.body: That's 85% of the staking rewards to be distributed to the holders. What is the APY for staking?

comments.author: binanceautotrader
comments.body: "What to expect from staking rewards?We are expecting to have 4-7% APY on our staking procedures."

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: binanceautotrader on October 13, 2022, 07:58:18 PM"What to expect from staking rewards?We are expecting to have 4-7% APY on our staking procedures."with how things are progressing here, i can say. this project would have hard time attracting users to get involve with this project. so is the big marketing campaign in dubai, miami or LA will still happen? or is this all talks?nft-based project is now everywhere. if you want to get interest from the community, need to be at least active or has regular presence in your social media channels.

comments.author: binanceautotrader
comments.body: giving more than 60% discount on PRESALE.The public price is 0.32 ETH! and PRESALE only 0.065 ETH!Great opportunity to flip some ETH!! They have some good 3d Arts
